extDescription.message: Find out about the location, ip address, timezone, currency and other information about the websites you visit!

localHostPage_text.message: This is your PC. Welcome home.
localHostPage_text.description: User is on an offline-browser site.

onionPage_text.message: This is an onion service. You can't find out it's location.
onionPage_text.description: User is on an Onion service. These are server, whose location can't be determined.

errorPage_text.message: There was an error. We are sorry.
errorPage_text.description: Error text when data couldn't be loaded.

loadingPage_text.description: Text when data is being loaded.

countryFlag_image_alt.description: Alternative image description text for country flag

clock_yourTime.description: Text of clock of user's time

clock_serverTime.description: Text of clock of server's time

information_ipAddress.description: Title of information box of server's ip address.

information_organisation.description: Title of information box of the server's internet organisation.

information_isp.description: Title of information box of the server's internet service provider.

information_timezone.description: Title of information box of the server's country timezone.

information_currency.description: Title of information box of the server's country currency.
